amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for salaries and expenses of the Office of Community Planning and Development by $3.5 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the salaries and expenses account for the Office of Community Planning and Development by $3,500,000, and apply the savings to the deficit reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 240 (Roll no. 425).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 240 (Roll no. 425).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
